attributes.action: Intervene in the case of sacked dinner lady Carol Hill to ensure her re-instatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carol Hill was sacked by the governors of Great Tey Primary School, Essex for breaching the confidentiality of school bullies, by informing the bullied childs parents of the details of the incident. This is clearly wrong and she should be re-instated immediately and compensated for her loss of earnings.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the relevant department.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
